description: pillar and scroll; reverse painting of Mount Vernon on lower part of glass; clock face painted with flowers and gilt trim; three brass finials at top; IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS TO OPEN DOOR  put key in part way and turn it 1/4, key should rest in this position; place thumb below key, push key all the way in and turn key another 1/4 (so that key notch points up); if key is turned FURTHER, IT WILL STICK
dimension: a (clock): H.31-1/4 x W.17-1/2 x D.4-5/8 in. (including top finial); b (pendulum): H.3-1/4 x W.2-1/4 in.; c (key): H.7/16 x L.1-3/16 in.; d,e,f (finials): H.4-3/16 x W.1 x D.1 in. (each)
title: Mantle clock
